column1: 1. Are you a: ( Check as many as apply)
column2: 2. Actualment estàs estudiant / treballant / vivint a: ( Currently you are studying / working / living in: )
column3: 2.a. Si has seleccionat un altra, si-us-plau, especifica: (. If you selected Other, please specify: )
column4: 3. Quin són els ingressos familiars anuals? ( What is your annual household income? )
column5: 4. Quin és el màxim nivell acadèmic que has assolit? ( What is the highest degree or level of education you have completed? )
column6: 5. Avalua del 1 al 5 sobre els efectes que tindria la setmana de quatre dies per als estudians. 1 completament negatiu a 5 completament beneficiós. ( Please rate on scale from 1 to 5 what the effects of a Four-Day School week would be on Students? 1 (negative effect) to 5 ( maximum benefit) )
column7: 5.1. How would it affect the students academically (Com afectaria acadèmicament als estudiants)
column8: 5.2. The effects of a longer school day (Els efectes d'una jornada escolar més llarga)
column9: 5.3. School activities/ extra-curriculum (using the extra day off)/(Activitats escolars/extraescolars (aprofitant el dia de descans adicional))
column13: 5.7. Students Outcomes (more time for studying and tutoring)( Resultats acadèmics)
column14: 6. Avalua els efectes de la implementació de la setmana de quatre dies per als pares/ famílies. 1 completament negatiu a 5 completament positiu. (. Please rate the effects of moving to a Four-Day School Week for parents/ families. 1 (negative effect) to 5 ( maximum benefit) )
column15: 6.1. Efectes econòmics ( transport escolar, Serveis de menjador,... ). ( Financial effects for parents / families (transportation, food services, utilities bills...) =
column17: 6.3. Afectació a la vida familiar ( Effects on family life )
column18: 6.4. Atenció i cure dels infants ( Childcare issues )
column19: 7. Avalua els posibles efectes de la setmana de quatre dies tindrien els professors/escola. 1 negatius efectes a 5 màxim beneficis. ( Please rate effects of a Four-Day week would be on teachers/School. 1 (negative effect) to 5 ( maximum benefit) )
column20: 7.1. Cost financed per a les escoles ( Transports, neteja, Serveis, personal administrate,..) ( Financial cost for schools (transportation, food services, utilities bill))
column21: 7.2. Gestió del temps del professorat ( Time management of staff )
column25: 8. Which key stage would be more suitable the Four-Day School Week?
column26: 9. Would you agree if the next academic year implemented a four-day week?
